#labels Phase-Deploy
= How to install and deploy Maven DbDep Plugin =

This page is dedicated to show how to install Maven Db Dependencies Plugin. 

= Details =

==Database creation==
Download and execute with a SQL client setup_db.sql

==Configure you own Maven project==

Copy JAR and POM file in a directory and install Maven DbDep Plugin on you local Maven repository in this way:
{{{
mvn install:install-file -DgroupId=com.sourcesense -DartifactId=maven-dbdep-plugin -Dversion=0.1 -Dpackaging=jar -Dfile=maven-dbdep-plugin-0.1.jar -DpomFile=maven-dbdep-plugin-0.1.pom
}}}

Now you can add this snippet in your own project POM file:
{{{
      <plugin>
        <groupId>com.sourcesense</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-dbdep-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>0.1</version>
        <executions>
          <execution>
            <id>dbdep</id>
            <goals>
              <goal>dbdep</goal>
            </goals>
          </execution>
        </executions>
      </plugin>
}}}
